name: accessibility_to_cities_2015_v1.0
title: Accessibility to Cities (2015)
description: Estimated travel time (in minutes) to cities for the year 2015.
details: Incorporates data from Open Street Map (OSM) data and the Google roads database. Not suited for time series analysis using earlier travel time estimates for the year 2000.

extract_types_info.mean: average travel time per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum travel time per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum travel time per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: D.J. Weiss, A. Nelson, H.S. Gibson, W. Temperley, S. Peedell, A. Lieber, M. Hancher, E. Poyart, S. Belchior, N. Fullman, B. Mappin, U. Dalrymple, J. Rozier, T.C.D. Lucas, R.E. Howes, L.S. Tusting, S.Y. Kang, E. Cameron, D. Bisanzio, K.E. Battle, S. Bhatt, and P.W. Gething. A global map of travel time to cities to assess inequalities in accessibility in 2015. (2018). Nature. doi:10.1038/nature25181.
